DOC.brief_summary: The aim study apply acute kidney injury criterion base KDIGO classification population patient undergoing cardiac surgery [ coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) cardiac valve surgery ( CVS ) ] evaluate impact predictor 30-day mortality .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Kidney Injury After Cardiac Surgery Based KDIGO Criteria
DOC.detailed_description: This single center study . We evaluate retrospectively patient Cardiac Surgery Intensive Care Unit Hospital de Base , São José Rio Preto Medical School , São Paulo , Brazil . Demographics , type surgery , laboratory data preoperative , perioperative , postoperative information retrieve prospectively collect database 2878 patient older 18 year undergo isolated CABG ( 1786 ) CVS ( 1092 ) , January 2003 June 2013 . After apply exclusion criterion ( 51 patient incomplete data 23 patient end-stage kidney disease ) analyze 2804 patient total , 1738 ( 62 % ) underwent CABG 1066 ( 38 % ) underwent CVS .
DOC.criteria: patient undergo isolated coronary artery bypass graft cardiac valve surgery . patient incomplete data patient endstage kidney disease .
